p: To determine the cutoff value for the sandwich ELISA, 60 H3-free samples, including chicken cloacal swab samples and tissue samples, were tested. The average (X) OD 450nm was 0.1297, the SD was 0.0415, and the X + 3SD was 0.2542. For an OD 450nm ≥ 0.2542, the sample was determined to be positive; for an OD 450nm < 0.2542, the sample was determined to be negative.
